articles.description: MGNREGA is the government’s flagship rural job guarantee scheme. It guarantees 100 days of work a year to every rural household. It aims to guarantee the right to work.

articles.author: Mirror Now
articles.title: India logs 21,411 new Covid-19 cases, 67 deaths in the last 24 hours
articles.description: India's Covid-19 tally climbed to 4,38,68,476 on Saturday with 21,411 fresh cases, while the number of active cases increased to 1,50,100, according to Union health ministry data.
articles.content: India's Covid-19 tally climbed to 4,38,68,476 on Saturday with 21,411 fresh cases, while the number of active cases increased to 1,50,100, according to Union health ministry data.

articles.title: Beijing court rules against woman who wanted to freeze eggs
articles.description: In China, national law does not explicitly ban unmarried people from services like fertility treatments, and simply states that a "husband and wife" can have up to three children.
